original_text: A man must not send his wife away and then marry another woman. If he does that, it is the same as if he had sex with another man's wife. Also, if a woman has left her husband, another man must not marry her. That is the same as if he had sex with another man's wife.’
korean_text: 무릇 자기 아내를 버리고 다른 데 장가 드는 자도 간음함이요 무릇 버림당한 여자에게 장가드는 자도 간음함이니라

sentences.original_text: A man must not send his wife away
sentences.korean_translation: 한 남자는 자신의 아내를 내보내서는 안 됩니다
그리고 다른 여자와 결혼해서는 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: it is the same as if he had sex with another man's wife
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 다른 남자의 아내와 성관계를 가진 것과 같습니다

sentences.original_text: Also, if a woman has left her husband
sentences.korean_translation: 또한, 만약 한 여자가 남편을 떠났다면

sentences.original_text: another man must not marry her
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 남자는 그녀와 결혼해서는 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: That is the same as if he had sex with another man's wife
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 다른 남자의 아내와 성관계를 가진 것과 같습니다
